title: Got stuck in Champ Select and now I can't queue
body: Decided to rank in the morning and in champ select, for the first time, the lobby said a message about loading Summoners Rift or something and so me and the team got stuck in there for 10 minutes before I dodged. Now I re-login and client won't let me queue. I tried practice mode and it said I'm already in the game. Riot help!!

replies.body: Same thing happening here. Haven't been able to queue for almost 3 hours.

A lot of people seem to have gotten stuck in ghost games this morning. They usually resolve within 4 hours, but if you're still having trouble submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Same problem happening to me buddy.

me too https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/611xMaaF-que-load-for-aram-froze-and-i-cant-make-or-join-any-game-modes-at-all-and-theres-no-reconnect and still am but mine's in ARAM so now I'm just waiting for Riot support
